Package danogl.gui

Class Sound

java.lang.Object
danogl.gui.Sound
public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a sound (sound-effect or music)
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Sound​(javax.sound.sampled.Clip[] clips)
    Create a Sound from a clip array.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void play()
    Play the sound once
    void playLooped()
    Play the sound in a loop
    void stopAllOccurences()
    Stop playing the sound.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Sound

      public Sound​(javax.sound.sampled.Clip[] clips)
      Create a Sound from a clip array. Used internally by the engine

  • Method Details

    • play

      public void play()
      Play the sound once

    • playLooped

      public void playLooped()
      Play the sound in a loop

    • stopAllOccurences

      public void stopAllOccurences()
      Stop playing the sound. If the sound is played multiple times simultaneously, this method stops all occurences
